parameters: I havent forgotten the attunement Icebreaker,
Of course I appreciate you saving the energy
You can be such a baby sometimes!
Self Switch: A B C D
Self Switch: A B C D
Self Switch: A B C D
Snow! Before you go running off full speed,
I need to get the attunement crystal running
Incredible! I can sense the power emanating
I wish I could study it!
Is it heavy? How does it feel?
I dont know, it feels floaty.
Do I just... Put it on?
Yeah, If my thesis is correct, the orb should
Very interesting, I wonder how the orb can encapsulate so much.
Considering on how the tile can pull energy from it.
It must have its own gravitational pull.
The amount of pull required from that thing would kill us all in an instant.
And it's weight would be beyond belief.
My guess is that whoever made the orb was able to alter the rules of its trochia.
Yeah, that's just my guess! Amazing right!
Trochia is one of the fixed laws of runecraft.
It's something that I never knew could be altered.
Seeing this with my own eyes...
It almost makes me want to go back.
What do you think Lussuria? Awsome right?!
I think this is very concerning.
Why is that such an issue? This magic is thousands of years old, probably more.
Snow, you dont understand. If they were able to alter the trochia of this magic..
That is like us figuring out how to defy physics, go back in time, or achieve immortality.
It's a feat that would change the entire species forever.
The fact that they did something like this,
And still could not find a solution...
What hope do we have right?
I was just getting hopeful too.
The cost of seeing a magical breakthrough,
I might go and take that bath now.
I was going to say, this will be much more challenging than I thought.
But I believe we can still figure it out.
But there will be no more time for sleep!
Are you going to analyze the Orb using your frostblood?
I am going to analyze this thing from shell to core.
I won't sleep until I've learned all I could.
Groundskeeper, I am starting to belive you arent the magic-less grasshead engineer you portray yourself to be.
I never said I was magic-less.
I am already seeing alterations in the trochia of the magic, I would have never looked there otherwise.
Tell me, what magic did you study?
If you don't mind, I rather not say.
I may not be as old as you two but the little history I have, I rather not speak of it.
I don't mean it like that.
Very well my little magical engineer assistant.
I will require parchment, sustanance and around the clock scribe work!.
I'll take upgraded title as a complement.
Lussuria draws some symbols onto a small parchment she had.
YOU CAN SEE THEM IN THE ORB?
I told you, I'm a genius.
We will need alot of parchment, ready to make a codex, groundskeeper?
We will have our own intellectual battle here!
By the time Snow brings the next orb, we will have juiced this one for all the knowledge it has!
(Did she just call me a brute?)
Who knew writing margins in school would actually pay off.
Ms. Hecate was right about something after all.
Stay focused! I have alot more coming!
I havent forgotten the attunement Icebreaker,
Of course I appreciate you saving the energy
You can be such a baby sometimes!
